tgt_original: cittavajreṇa bhagavān  vijñānaskandha sthito [ ' ] py asau ||
sarvasandhi śarīrasya  samantabhadras tathāgataḥ | (44)  sarvasnāyuḥ śarīrasya
lokeśvaras tathāgataḥ |  manasi sthitam indriyaṃ tasya  mañjughoṣas tathāgataḥ |
tasmād vajraguroḥ kāye  jināḥ sarvve adhiṣṭhitāḥ
samaste caiva kāye'smin  sarva tathāgatāḥ sthitāḥ |
